channel.title: RGA on neo-Reliability
channel.description: Recent content in RGA on neo-Reliability

item.title: Reliability Growth
item.description: What is the Reliability Growth? Background The Reliability Growth Analysis (RGA) is an analytical tool used to assess the change in the reliability of equipment, system or a plant. The output of the analysis is given as:- Trend showing the reliability change in terms of time(cycle, Km, ) on the X-axis and failure rate (or MTBF since itâ€™s the inverse of failure rate) on the Y-axis.
